title: Gps stopped working
content:
Suddenly my GPS stopped working. When I open Google Maps or Waze or any other app that uses my location, they don't work because the phone can't detect my location at all, as if the location setting was turned off.
My phone didn't fell or nothing, I was watching a movie and when it ended I opened Google Maps but it didn't work. So then is where I realized there was a problem.
So far I tried restarting the phone, turning off location, switching to airplane mode, but nothing seems to work out.
Is this a hardware problem or can it be solved with a software update?
Thanks for the help.
